TextBody:
Hi William,

We hope you are doing well.

I have raised this internally with our R&D team to see if we have any documentation on this.

I will get back to you as soon as I receive an update from them.

Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer

ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NBMMZ:ref
Subject: Server – Client Communication TLS protocol    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NBMMZ:ref ]

TextBody:
Hi William,

I have just received an update from our Product Team.

Unfortunately we don't support SSL offloading of our client-server communication. The SSL passthrugh must be allowed.

Please let me know if there is any other information that I can provide.

Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com
